remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当 控件 属性已设置或其 属性为时，才会发生此事件 `true` 。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 如果要根据行的状态和其包含的值确定行的错误，则处理事件会很有用。Handling the event is useful when you want to determine the error for a row depending on its state and the values it contains. 处理 事件并在处理程序中指定错误文本时，除非将属性设置为，否则行标题中将显示错误标志符号 `false` 。When you handle the event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the row header unless the property is set to `false`. 当用户将鼠标指针移到错误标志符号上方时，错误文本将显示在工具提示中。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip. 如果检索属性的值，也会发生该事件 。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved. 您可以使用 属性来确定行的状态或值，并使用此信息来更改或修改 属性。You can use the property to determine the state or value of a row, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性将用行属性的值进行初始化，该属性的值将 重写。This property is initialized with the value of the row property, which the event value overrides. 处理 大量数据时处理事件，以避免设置多行的行值时的性能损失 。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row value for multiple rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `DataGridView1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
